articles.author: Josephine Walker
articles.title: Trump sets lowest-ever refugee cap. See how other presidents compare. - Axios
articles.description: White South Africans will get most slots under Trump's refugee cap.
articles.content:
The Trump administration won't allow more than 7,500 refugees to enter America in FY2026, a record-low cap that prioritizes admitting Afrikaners, or white South Africans, into the country.
Why it ma… [+3893 chars]
